However, since I cannot perform the actual action, I will provide you with the JSON object that you should be able to use to execute this subtask using a programmatic interface:

```json

```

This series of actions mimics the pressing of Ctrl+F to open the find dialog, typing "student2" to search for records related to that student, and then pressing Enter to initiate the search. After this, one would typically review the highlighted search results to check all records for "student2". However, depending on how the search function works in the spreadsheet software and how it highlights the found entries, additional actions might be necessary to jump between occurrences of "student2".
